attributes.title: Mind is not an object, it is not a thing, it is an action
attributes.description: From the works of Living Enlightened Master Paramahamsa Nithyananda.  In this clip taken from Patanjali Yoga Sutras discourse series, Swamiji teaches us that mind is not an object, it is a thing.  The moment you take responsibility and start remembering that, suddenly you will see you are able to stop when you dont want and operate when you want.  Having that liberation will establish in your own nature.  The complete discourse series on Patanjali Yoga Sutras may be ordered online at www.lifeblissgalleria.com
